column6: AVENGERS INFINITY! - What if Hank Pym never created Ultron at all? - Could a world without Ultron survive a world without Ultron's own weapon-turned-Avenger, the Vision? - Can the very idea of the Avengers survive without each other? - In the darkest of all realities, can the Avengers ever hope to Assemble? v
column8: | artist:Ming Doyle | writer:Joseph Keatinge | penciller (cover):Chris Stevens
